agents.name: Stockimg.ai
agents.shortDescription: AI Agent for social media content creation and scheduling.
agents.longDescription: Stockimg.ai is an all-in-one AI-driven social media management platform that enables users to create, schedule, and automate posts across multiple social media platforms. It offers AI-powered content generation, smart scheduling, and comprehensive account management, making it easier for businesses and individuals to maintain a consistent and engaging social media presence while saving time and resources.
useCases: Managing multiple social accounts from one dashboard,
Optimizing post timing for maximum engagement,
Creating consistent brand messaging across platforms,
Generating multilingual content for global audiences
agents.tags: Social media management, AI content creation, Marketing automation, Digital marketing, Social media scheduling

agents.name: CustomerFinderBot
agents.shortDescription: Discover your customers in seconds with social media AI
agents.longDescription: CustomerFinderBot is a cutting-edge AI agent that revolutionizes lead generation by intelligently scanning X (formerly Twitter) and Reddit to identify high-potential customers primed for your product or service. By leveraging advanced natural language processing and machine learning algorithms, our bot analyzes millions of social media posts in real-time, pinpointing users who express needs, pain points, or interests aligned with your offerings. This powerful tool not only saves you countless hours of manual prospecting but also significantly boosts your sales potential by connecting you with leads at the perfect moment in their buyer's journey.
keyFeatures: Automatically find high potential leads from X and Reddit,
useCases: For automatically finding leads from X and Reddit to save time and effort and to boost sales.

agents.name: SEObotAI
agents.longDescription: SEObot is an autonomous AI-driven platform that automates various SEO tasks, including keyword research, content creation, and optimization. It's designed to help busy website owners, developers, and project makers improve their site's search engine rankings and organic traffic with minimal manual effort.

agents.name: Mentio
agents.shortDescription: Supercharge Your Social Media Outreach With AI Marketing Agents
agents.longDescription:
Mentio helps people discover your product by mentioning it in relevant online conversations.
​Mentio finds the perfect conversations to plug your product across 5 platform, saving you 5+ hours back every week.

AI-Powered Replies: Mentio utilizes GPT-4 and Claude 3.5 Sonnet models to craft authentic, context-sensitive responses that incorporate your product mentions.
More Sales: Automatically participate in relevant conversations, boost product visibility and customer interaction without additional effort.
Save Time: Save over 15 hours per month by automating the process of finding and engaging with suitable online discussions.
keyFeatures: Authentic Replies in Context: Mentio's crawler scans for relevant discussions across social media platforms then crafts
and automatically posts a useful and relevant reply that mentions your product casually and naturally,
Adaptive Continuous Learning: Mentio continuously learns from campaign performance data and the source website (URL you provided) to improve mention placements over time,

Customizable For Your Ways: Mentio allows you to create customized campaigns that align with your marketing goals. Features include adjustable frequency of mentions/ tone of replies according to your tone
useCases: AI-Powered Replies: Mentio utilizes GPT-4 and Claude 3.5 Sonnet models to craft authentic, context-sensitive responses that incorporate your product mentions,
More Sales: Automatically participate in relevant conversations, boost product visibility and customer interaction without additional effort,
Save Time: Save over 15 hours per month by automating the process of finding and engaging with suitable online discussions,
Reliable Compliance: We ensure all engagements are respectful and adhere to platform guidelines, maintaining brand reputation and user trust
agents.tags: AI, Marketing, Social Media, Outreach, automation, workflow,

agents.name: Humanic AI
agents.shortDescription: Drive more revenue with Agentic Marketing
agents.longDescription: Humanic creates tailored content for micro-cohorts for compounding activations & adoption
keyFeatures: Humanic provides 4 pre-configured agents a - Strategy agent that co-ordinates the tasks of the Content Agent, Brand Agent & Segmentation agent to build your entire marketing campaign for you.
useCases: Reduce Onboarding time for new users,
Higher conversion to orders from emails,
Nurture long-tail of free customers to convert without sales involvment

agents.name: MagicSales.ai
agents.shortDescription: Boost Sales with Personalized LinkedIn Outreach
agents.longDescription: MagicSales.AI is an essential tool for creating highly effective, personalized LinkedIn messages. Just by clicking a button in a Chrome extension, our AI analyzes a user's profile and generates a customized message that resonates, enhancing your sales prospecting and increasing conversion rates.
agents.tags: linkedin, sales, ai messaging, outreach, personalization, chrome extension

agents.name: Tweet Fast
agents.shortDescription: AI Writer that transforms your tweets from meh to mind-blown in 8 seconds flat.
agents.longDescription:
TweetFast is a comprehensive AI-powered platform designed to revolutionize your Twitter content creation process. By leveraging analysis from over 10,000 top-performing tweets, the platform transforms basic drafts into compelling content using proven frameworks for viral engagement.
The tool offers multiple AI-powered features, including viral tweet generation, thread hook creation, Socratic tweet composition, idea generation, and tweet rewriting capabilities. With pricing options ranging from a Starter plan ($4.99/month) to a Lifetime package ($145), TweetFast caters to individual creators and agencies alike.
agents.tags: twittergrowth, contentcreation, socialmedia, aiwriting, twittermarketing, personalbranding, saas, productivity, digitaltool, startup, nocode, buildinpublic, indiehackers, marketingtools

agents.name: Agent WordLift
agents.shortDescription: Your AI-Powered SEO and Customer Engagement Assistant
agents.longDescription: Our custom AI Agent is specifically trained to your needs and Brand identity with all your Knowledge Graph and proprietary SEO data. It automates SEO tasks, generates high-quality content, and provides actionable insights—helping you save time and focus on strategic growth and customer engagement.

agents.name: Lin
agents.longDescription: Writes engaging LinkedIn posts to boost your startup’s presence. Lin is composing personalized LinkedIn posts for company or individual profiles. Based on a given topic or based on existing content.

agents.name: Promarkia
agents.shortDescription: Empower your business with AI-Native Marketing Agents
agents.longDescription: Instantly automate all your marketing tasks, generate reports from Google Analytics live data, generate keywords with stats and SEO parameters, text-to-images and videos, blog articles, and social posts, then automatically publish them to WordPress and your social networks.
keyFeatures: generate reports from Google Analytics live data
generate keywords with stats and SEO parameters
automatically publish to WordPress and your social networks
useCases: A full marketing team at your fingertips

agents.name: LeadRun
agents.longDescription: LeadRun simplifies the lead generation process on Twitter for small and medium-sized businesses by identifying their target audience through the right keywords. Using AI-powered algorithms, it analyzes the needs of potential leads, generates personalized messages, and automates their management. Additionally, the system contributes to your brand’s organic growth, allowing you to reach a broader audience. With pricing plans tailored to different needs, LeadRun caters to businesses of all sizes.
keyFeatures: AI-Powered Lead Detection: Effortlessly identify high-potential leads with advanced AI algorithms that scan and analyze social media activity
Automated Personalized Responses: Generate and send AI-crafted, personalized responses that resonate with your audience, fostering meaningful connections automatically
Automated Personalized Responses: Leverage relevant conversations to expand your brand’s visibility, turning interactions into new followers and potential customers

agents.name: Work Fast
agents.shortDescription: AI Browser Assistant: Boost Productivity with ChatGPT Automation
agents.longDescription: An AI-powered assistant that integrates ChatGPT directly into your browser, automating daily tasks and workflows with advanced AI and agent capabilities. Boost productivity effortlessly with intelligent automation tailored to your needs.
useCases: Use AI agents to automate your work
Chat with AI and get any assistance
